                                                                                                                                    3Use Cases

                                                                                                                                    • 3.1Use Case "ELEMENT"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.2Use Case "ACROSS"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.3Use Case "OTHER"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.4Use Case "WILDCARD"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.5Use Case "STEMMING"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.6Use Case "THESAURUS"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.7Use Case "STOP-WORD"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.8Use Case "CHARACTER"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.9Use Case "LOGICAL"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.10Use Case "CARDINALITY"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.11Use Case "PROXIMITY"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.12Use Case "AXES"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.13Use Case "IGNORE"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.14Use Case "FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.15Use Case "XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY"
                                                                                                                                    • 3.16Use Case "SCORE"

                                                                                                                                    3.1Use Case "ELEMENT"

                                                                                                                                    Query words and phrases in XML elements with simple content. Section 2.

                                                                                                                                      element-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                      Find all book titles containing the word "usability".
                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                      #element-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                      Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-ELEMENT/element-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-ELEMENT/element-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                      element-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                      Find all book subjects containing the phrase "usability testing".

                                                                                                                                      3.2Use Case "ACROSS"

                                                                                                                                      Query across element boundaries. Section 3.

                                                                                                                                        across-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                        Description:
                                                                                                                                        Find all book chapters containing the phrase "one of the best known lists of heuristics is Ten Usability Heuristics".
                                                                                                                                        Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                        #across-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                        Query:
                                                                                                                                        Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                        Inputs:
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                        Outputs:
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q1.xml

                                                                                                                                        across-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                        Description:
                                                                                                                                        Find all book chapters containing the phrase "one of the best known lists of heuristics is Ten Usability Heuristics".
                                                                                                                                        Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                        #across-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                        Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                        Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q1b.xq
                                                                                                                                        Inputs:
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                        Outputs:
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q1.xml

                                                                                                                                        across-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                        Description:
                                                                                                                                        Find all part introductions containing the word "prototypes".
                                                                                                                                        Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                        #across-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                        Query:
                                                                                                                                        Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q2.xq
                                                                                                                                        Inputs:
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                        Outputs:
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q2.xml
                                                                                                                                        Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-ACROSS/across-queries-results-q2.txt

                                                                                                                                        3.3Use Case "OTHER"

                                                                                                                                        Explicit query of attributes. Section 4.

                                                                                                                                          other-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                          Description:
                                                                                                                                          Q1 Query on Attribute: Find all books with "improve" "web" "usability" in the short title. This query finds multiple words in an attribute allowing word variants and allowing the words in any order with up to a specified number of intervening words.
                                                                                                                                          Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                          #other-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                          Query:
                                                                                                                                          Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-OTHER/other-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                          Inputs:
                                                                                                                                          Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                          Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                          Outputs:
                                                                                                                                          Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-OTHER/other-queries-results-q1.xml

                                                                                                                                          other-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force

                                                                                                                                          Q2 Query on Element and Attribute: Find all books with the phrase "manuscript guides" in the short title and the phrase "user profiling" in a component title. This query finds a phrase in an attribute and a phrase in an element.

                                                                                                                                          #other-queries-results-q2

                                                                                                                                          3.4Use Case "WILDCARD"

                                                                                                                                          Queries which use wildcards to append or insert a character or sequence of characters to a word or a part of a word. Section 5.

                                                                                                                                            wildcard-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                            Description:
                                                                                                                                            Q1 One Character Suffix Wildcard Query: Find all books with the word "test" with a one character suffix in the text. This query finds a word with a one character suffix (one character after the last character).
                                                                                                                                            Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                            #wildcard-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                            Query:
                                                                                                                                            Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-WILDCARD/wildcard-queries-results-q1.xq

                                                                                                                                            3.5Use Case "STEMMING"

                                                                                                                                            Queries involving a stemming algorithm (e.g., Porter) which returns noun, verb, adjective, and adverb forms of a word or root of a word in singular and plural. Section 6.

                                                                                                                                              stemming-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                              Q1 Query Stemming on Word Root: Find all books with the word "test" in the text. This query finds a word and its variants applying a stemming algorithm.
                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                              #stemming-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                              Query:
                                                                                                                                              Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STEMMING/stemming-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                              Inputs:
                                                                                                                                              Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                              Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                              Outputs:
                                                                                                                                              Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-STEMMING/stemming-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                              stemming-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                              Q1 Query Stemming on Word Root: Find all books with the word "test" in the text. This query finds a word and its variants applying a stemming algorithm.
                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                              #stemming-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                              Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                              Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STEMMING/stemming-queries-results-q1b.xq
                                                                                                                                              Inputs:
                                                                                                                                              Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                              Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                              Outputs:
                                                                                                                                              Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-STEMMING/stemming-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                              stemming-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                              Q2 Query Stemming on Multiple Word Roots: Find all books with the phrases "usability testing" or "user testing" in the text. This query finds phrases applying a stemming algorithm to selected words within the phrases.
                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                              #stemming-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                              Query:

                                                                                                                                              Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-STEMMING/stemming-queries-results-q2.txt

                                                                                                                                              stemming-queries-results-q2b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                              Q2 Query Stemming on Multiple Word Roots: Find all books with the phrases "usability testing" or "user testing" in the text. This query finds phrases applying a stemming algorithm to selected words within the phrases.

                                                                                                                                              #stemming-queries-results-q2

                                                                                                                                              3.6Use Case "THESAURUS"

                                                                                                                                              Queries which return synonyms or related words identified by thesauri, dictionaries, and taxonomies. Section 7.

                                                                                                                                                thesaurus-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                Q1 Query on Synonyms Identified by a Thesaurus: Find all introductions which quote someone. This query finds words and phrases using a thesaurus to return synonyms.
                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                Query:
                                                                                                                                                Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                                Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                Role: thesaurus Source ID: usability (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q1.xml

                                                                                                                                                thesaurus-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                Q1 Query on Synonyms Identified by a Thesaurus: Find all introductions which quote someone. This query finds words and phrases using a thesaurus to return synonyms.
                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q1

                                                                                                                                                Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q1b.xq

                                                                                                                                                Role: thesaurus Source ID: usability (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q1.xml

                                                                                                                                                thesaurus-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                Q2 Query on Narrower Terms Identified by a Thesaurus: Find all books with text on improving "web site components". This query finds words using a thesaurus to identify narrower terms.
                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q2

This query finds words using a thesaurus to identify narrower terms.

                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q2

                                                                                                                                                thesaurus-queries-results-q3 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                Q3 Query on Broader Terms Identified by a Thesaurus: Are there any "letters" or "holiday cards" in John Wesley Usabilityguy's papers? This query finds words and phrases using a thesaurus to identify broader terms.
                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                Query:
                                                                                                                                                Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q3.xq
                                                                                                                                                Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                Role: thesaurus Source ID: usability (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q3.xml

                                                                                                                                                thesaurus-queries-results-q3b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                Q3 Query on Broader Terms Identified by a Thesaurus: Are there any "letters" or "holiday cards" in John Wesley Usabilityguy's papers? This query finds words and phrases using a thesaurus to identify broader terms.
                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q3b.xq

                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-THESAURUS/thesaurus-queries-results-q3.xml

                                                                                                                                                thesaurus-queries-results-q4 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                Q4 Query on Word Which Sounds Like Other Words: Find all books with words which sound like "Merrygould". This query finds words using a dictionary of words which sound like the word queried.

                                                                                                                                                #thesaurus-queries-results-q4

                                                                                                                                                3.7Use Case "STOP-WORD"

                                                                                                                                                Queries on stop-words. Section 8.

                                                                                                                                                  stop-word-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                  Q1 Query on Stop Word Treated as a Stop Word: Find all books with the phrase "planning then conducting" in the text where "then" is treated as a stop word. This query finds a phrase substituting any word for a word which has been identified as a stop word via a stop word list.
                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                  #stop-word-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                  Role: stopwords Source ID: stopwords1 (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q1.xml
                                                                                                                                                  Error: err:FTST0006

                                                                                                                                                  stop-word-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                  Q1 Query on Stop Word Treated as a Stop Word: Find all books with the phrase "planning then conducting" in the text where "then" is treated as a stop word. This query finds a phrase substituting any word for a word which has been identified as a stop word via a stop word list.
                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                  #stop-word-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                  Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q1b.xq
                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                  Role: stopwords Source ID: stopwords1 (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q1.xml
                                                                                                                                                  Error: err:FTST0006

                                                                                                                                                  stop-word-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                  Q2 Query on Stop Word Not Treated as a Stop Word: Find all books with the phrase "planning then conducting" in the text where "then" is not treated as a stop word. This query does not eliminate a word from the query even though it has been identified as a stop word in the stop word list, making it available again for querying.
                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                  #stop-word-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q2.xq
                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q2.xml

                                                                                                                                                  stop-word-queries-results-q2b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                  Q2 Query on Stop Word Not Treated as a Stop Word: Find all books with the phrase "planning then conducting" in the text where "then" is not treated as a stop word. This query does not eliminate a word from the query even though it has been identified as a stop word in the stop word list, making it available again for querying.
                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                  #stop-word-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                  Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q2b.xq
                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q2.xml

                                                                                                                                                  stop-word-queries-results-q3 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                  Q3 Query Excluding a Stop Word on a Stop Word List: Find books with the phrase "not been approved" in the text. This query finds a phrase substituting any words for words which have been identified as stop words via a stop word list, removing the word "not" temporarily from the stop word list.
                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                  #stop-word-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q3.xq
                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                  Role: stopwords Source ID: stopwords1 (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q3.txt
                                                                                                                                                  Error: err:FTST0006

                                                                                                                                                  stop-word-queries-results-q3b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                  Q3 Query Excluding a Stop Word on a Stop Word List: Find books with the phrase "not been approved" in the text. This query finds a phrase substituting any words for words which have been identified as stop words via a stop word list, removing the word "not" temporarily from the stop word list.
                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                  #stop-word-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                  Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q3b.xq
                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                  Role: stopwords Source ID: stopwords1 (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-STOP-WORD/stop-word-queries-results-q3.txt
                                                                                                                                                  Error: err:FTST0006

                                                                                                                                                  3.8Use Case "CHARACTER"

                                                                                                                                                  Queries specifying normalized forms of characters and tokenized words. Section 9.

                                                                                                                                                    character-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                    Q1 Diacritics Sensitive Query: Verify the existence of a "rsum" in the papers of John Wesley Usabilityguy. This query finds a word only if it contains the diacritics as written in the query.
                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                    #character-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                    Query:
                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-CHARACTER/character-queries-results-q1.xq

                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-CHARACTER/character-queries-results-q1.xml
                                                                                                                                                    Error: err:FOCH0002

                                                                                                                                                    character-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                    Q1 Diacritics Sensitive Query: Verify the existence of a "rsum" in the papers of John Wesley Usabilityguy. This query finds a word only if it contains the diacritics as written in the query.

                                                                                                                                                    #character-queries-results-q1

This query finds a word whether diacritics are present or not.

                                                                                                                                                    #character-queries-results-q2

This query finds a word whether diacritics are present or not.

                                                                                                                                                    3.9Use Case "LOGICAL"

                                                                                                                                                    Queries containing logical expressions: or, and, the unary not, and not, and mild not. Section 10.

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q1 Or Query: Find all books with the words "web" or "software" in the text. This query finds any or all of the words.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                      Query:
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q1 Or Query: Find all books with the words "web" or "software" in the text. This query finds any or all of the words.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                      Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q1b.xq
                                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q2 And Query: Find all books with the words "web" "software" in the text. This query finds all of the words.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                      Query:
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q2.xq
                                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q2.txt

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q2b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q2 And Query: Find all books with the words "web" "software" in the text. This query finds all of the words.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                      Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q2b.xq
                                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q2.txt

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q3 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q3 And Query Ordered: Find all book text containing the words "goal" "obstacles" "task" in this order. This query finds multiple words in the order queried.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                      Query:
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q3.xq

                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q3.xml

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q3b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q3 And Query Ordered: Find all book text containing the words "goal" "obstacles" "task" in this order. This query finds multiple words in the order queried.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                      Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q3b.xq
                                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q3.xml

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q4 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q4 Unary Not Query: Find all books which do not belong in a collection on "usability testing". This query finds books which do not contain a phrase in an element and its descendants.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q4
                                                                                                                                                      Query:
                                                                                                                                                      Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q4.xq
                                                                                                                                                      Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                      Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                      Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-LOGICAL/logical-queries-results-q4.txt

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q4b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q4 Unary Not Query: Find all books which do not belong in a collection on "usability testing". This query finds books which do not contain a phrase in an element and its descendants.
                                                                                                                                                      Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q4

                                                                                                                                                      logical-queries-results-q5 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q5 And Not Query: Find all books with the word "usability" and not the word "plan" in the metadata. This query finds a word only when another is not found in an element or its descendants.

                                                                                                                                                      #logical-queries-results-q5

                                                                                                                                                      Description:
                                                                                                                                                      Q7 Mild Not Query Where Second Operand Is a Subset of the First Operand: Find all books with listings for "rsums", "drafts", or "correspondence", and not "book drafts", in the metadata or text. This query finds books with multiple words and not a phrase which contains one of the words, while not eliminating a result if it contains the phrase as well as one of the words searched.

                                                                                                                                                      3.10Use Case "CARDINALITY"

                                                                                                                                                      Queries in same, any, every instance of an element, and occurrence count query. Section 11.

                                                                                                                                                        cardinality-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                        Description:
                                                                                                                                                        Q1 Query in Same Instance of an Element: Find all books with the phrase "web site" and the word "usability" in the same subject. This query finds a word and a phrase in the same instance of an element.
                                                                                                                                                        Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                        #cardinality-queries-results-q1

                                                                                                                                                        3.11Use Case "PROXIMITY"

                                                                                                                                                        Queries on proximity relationships including distance, window, sentence, and paragraph. Section 12.

                                                                                                                                                          proximity-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                          Description:
                                                                                                                                                          Q1 Unordered Distance Query: Find all books with information on "software developers". This query finds multiple words in any order allowing up to a specified number of intervening words.
                                                                                                                                                          Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                          #proximity-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                          Query:
                                                                                                                                                          Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-PROXIMITY/proximity-queries-results-q1.xq

                                                                                                                                                          Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                          Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-PROXIMITY/proximity-queries-results-q1.xml
