                                                                                                                                                          3.12Use Case "AXES"

                                                                                                                                                          Queries traversing relative XPath axes. Section 13.

                                                                                                                                                            axes-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                            Description:
                                                                                                                                                            Q1 Query on Element and Its Children: Find all books with paragraphs containing the phrase "computer workstation" and footnotes within those paragraphs containing the word "comfortable". This query finds a phrase in an element, then finds a word in a child element.
                                                                                                                                                            Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                            #axes-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                            Query:
                                                                                                                                                            Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                                            Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                            Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                                            axes-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                            Description:
                                                                                                                                                            Q1 Query on Element and Its Children: Find all books with paragraphs containing the phrase "computer workstation" and footnotes within those paragraphs containing the word "comfortable". This query finds a phrase in an element, then finds a word in a child element.
                                                                                                                                                            Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                            #axes-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                            Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                            Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q1b.xq
                                                                                                                                                            Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                            Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                                            axes-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                            Description:
                                                                                                                                                            Q2 Query on Element Returning Its First Two Children: Find the first two steps in chapters on "conducting usability tests." This query finds words in an element, then returns its first two children elements.
                                                                                                                                                            Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                            #axes-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                            Query:
                                                                                                                                                            Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q2.xq
                                                                                                                                                            Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                            Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                            Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q2.txt
                                                                                                                                                            Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-AXES/axes-queries-results-q2-alt.txt

                                                                                                                                                            axes-queries-results-q2b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                            Description:
                                                                                                                                                            Q2 Query on Element Returning Its First Two Children: Find the first two steps in chapters on "conducting usability tests." This query finds words in an element, then returns its first two children elements.

                                                                                                                                                            3.13Use Case "IGNORE"

                                                                                                                                                            Queries ignoring descendant element content. Section 14.

                                                                                                                                                              ignore-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                                              Q1 Distance Query Ignoring Content of All Descendant Elements: Find advice on whether the observer should "correct" or provide "guidance" to the user during usability "testing". This query ignores the content of all descendant elements.
                                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                              #ignore-queries-results-q1

                                                                                                                                                              ignore-queries-results-q1b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force

                                                                                                                                                              Q1 Distance Query Ignoring Content of All Descendant Elements: Find advice on whether the observer should "correct" or provide "guidance" to the user during usability "testing". This query ignores the content of all descendant elements.

                                                                                                                                                              ignore-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                                              Q2 Phrase Query Ignoring Content of Descendant Element Specified by XPath Expression: Find all book chapters containing "users can be tested at any computer workstation or in a lab" ignoring footnotes. This query finds book chapters containing the phrase "users can be tested at any computer workstation or in a lab" ignoring the content of a descendant element explicitly specified by an XPath expression.

This query finds book chapters containing the phrase "users can be tested at any computer workstation or in a lab" ignoring the content of a descendant element explicitly specified by an XPath expression.

                                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                                              Q3 Phrase Query Ignoring Content of Descendant Element Specified by Full-Text Query: Find all book chapters containing the phrase "at any computer workstation or in a lab" ignoring footnotes on workstations. This query ignores the content of a descendant element specified by a full-text query.
                                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                              #ignore-queries-results-q3

                                                                                                                                                              Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q3.xq

                                                                                                                                                              ignore-queries-results-q3b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                                              Q3 Phrase Query Ignoring Content of Descendant Element Specified by Full-Text Query: Find all book chapters containing the phrase "at any computer workstation or in a lab" ignoring footnotes on workstations. This query ignores the content of a descendant element specified by a full-text query.
                                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                              #ignore-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                              Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                              Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q3b.xq
                                                                                                                                                              Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                              Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                              Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                              Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q3.txt

                                                                                                                                                              ignore-queries-results-q4 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                                              Q4 Distance Query Ignoring Content of Descendant Elements Level by Level: Find all books with the word "workstation" near the word "lab". This query performs a level-by-level ignore. It ignores the content of descendant elements when querying the content of the parent element. Its descendant elements are promoted and then their content is queried. It differs from the ignore queries above because it queries the content of parent elements skipping over the descendant elements, then instead of stopping there it queries the content of descendent elements in isolation.
                                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                              #ignore-queries-results-q4
                                                                                                                                                              Query:
                                                                                                                                                              Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q4.xq
                                                                                                                                                              Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                              Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                              Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                              Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q4.txt

                                                                                                                                                              ignore-queries-results-q4b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                              Description:
                                                                                                                                                              Q4 Distance Query Ignoring Content of Descendant Elements Level by Level: Find all books with the word "workstation" near the word "lab". This query performs a level-by-level ignore. It ignores the content of descendant elements when querying the content of the parent element. Its descendant elements are promoted and then their content is queried. It differs from the ignore queries above because it queries the content of parent elements skipping over the descendant elements, then instead of stopping there it queries the content of descendent elements in isolation.
                                                                                                                                                              Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                              #ignore-queries-results-q4
                                                                                                                                                              Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                              Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q4b.xq
                                                                                                                                                              Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                              Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                              Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                              Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-IGNORE/ignore-queries-results-q4.txt

                                                                                                                                                              3.14Use Case "FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY"

                                                                                                                                                              Queries illustrating composability of Full-Text with itself. Section 15.

                                                                                                                                                                full-text-composability-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                                Q1 Query on Words and Phrases in Two Languages: Find all books with the subject "", with an introduction written by "Elina Rose", which mention the name of the usability expert "Millicent Marigold". This query finds words and a phrase in more than one language.
                                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                #full-text-composability-queries-results-q1

                                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q1.txt
                                                                                                                                                                Error: err:FTST0009
                                                                                                                                                                Error: err:XPTY0004

                                                                                                                                                                full-text-composability-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                                Q2 Phrase and Distance Query in an Instance of an Element using Stemming: Find all paragraphs in books which discuss the role of "task performing" in "expert reviewer" methods. This query finds multiple words close to each other and a phrase in one instance of an element.
                                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                #full-text-composability-queries-results-q2

                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q2.txt
                                                                                                                                                                Error: err:FTST0009

This query finds multiple words close to each other and a phrase in one instance of an element.

                                                                                                                                                                full-text-composability-queries-results-q3 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                                Q3 Nested Distance Query using Wildcards, Stemming, and Thesaurus Support: Find all books on "usability testing" which "quote" "Millicent Marigold" on the value of "iterating" multiple times. This query finds multiple words in three nested levels of distance queries. It uses wildcards, stemming, and thesaurus support.
                                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                #full-text-composability-queries-results-q3

                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                Role: thesaurus Source ID: usability (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: XML Results/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q3.xml
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q3b.txt

                                                                                                                                                                full-text-composability-queries-results-q3b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                                Q3 Nested Distance Query using Wildcards, Stemming, and Thesaurus Support: Find all books on "usability testing" which "quote" "Millicent Marigold" on the value of "iterating" multiple times. This query finds multiple words in three nested levels of distance queries. It uses wildcards, stemming, and thesaurus support.
                                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                #full-text-composability-queries-results-q3

                                                                                                                                                                full-text-composability-queries-results-q4 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                                Q4 Window Query using Wildcards and Stemming Ignoring Content of a Descendant Element: Find advice on whether an observer in a "usability test" should "correct" or provide "guidance" to the user in a book not authored by Montana Marigold. This query uses synonyms supplied by the user, uses the unary not, nests a Boolean query and a phrase query within a window query, and ignores the tags and content of a descendant element.
                                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                #full-text-composability-queries-results-q4
                                                                                                                                                                Query:
                                                                                                                                                                Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q4.xq
                                                                                                                                                                Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q4.txt

                                                                                                                                                                full-text-composability-queries-results-q5 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                Description:
                                                                                                                                                                Q5 Query on Different Elements in Different Sub-Trees with Conditional Return: For each book with a title containing the word "usability", a book introduction containing the word "satisfaction", and a part introduction containing the phrase "identify problems", return the book title and the authors if it has authors. Return the book title and publisher, if it has no authors. This query finds words and a phrase in different elements in different sub-trees. It also contains a conditional return.
                                                                                                                                                                Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                #full-text-composability-queries-results-q5
                                                                                                                                                                Query:
                                                                                                                                                                Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q5.xq
                                                                                                                                                                Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-FULL-TEXT-COMPOSABILITY/full-text-composability-queries-results-q5.txt

                                                                                                                                                                3.15Use Case "XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY"

                                                                                                                                                                Queries combining full-text queries with other XQuery and XPath functionalities. Section 16.

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q1 Full-Text Query Constructing New Element: For books with "usability" in the title create a flat list of all title-author pairs, with each pair enclosed in a newly constructed element. This query finds a word in an element and returns the element and another wrapped in a new element.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q1.xq

                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q1.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q2 Full-Text Query Returning Count of Descendant Element Occurrences: Find all books with a chapter title on "usability tests". Return book title, chapter title, and the number of steps in chapters. This query finds words then returns among other elements a constructed element reporting the number of occurrences of a descendant element.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q2.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q2.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q3 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q3 Full-Text Query with Conditional Return: For each book with "usability" in the book title, return the book title and a second element. Return the book title and a third element if the second element does not exist. This query finds a word and contains a conditional return.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q3.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q3.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q4 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q4 Full-Text Query with Numeric Value Comparison: For each book with "usability" in the book title, return its book title and the round number of its suggested price if the price exceeds $25. This query finds a word and contains a conditional return based on a function on a numeric value.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q4
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q4.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q4.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q5 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q5 Full-Text Query with Character String Query: Find all introductions in books, published in "Washington, D.C.", which include listings for "rsums", "drafts", and "correspondence". This query finds words and a character string.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q5
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q5.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q5.txt
                                                                                                                                                                  Error: err:FOCH0002

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q6 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q6 Full-Text Query with Conditional Return of Boolean Values: For each book on "usability" return the book title and a new has-publishers element with value true if the book has more than 1 publisher. Return the title and a new has-publishers element with value false if the book does not have more than one publisher. This query finds a word, then returns Boolean values based on the number of occurrences of an element.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q6
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q6.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q6.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q7 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q7 Full-Text Query with Date Comparison and Element Occurrence Count: Find all books about conducting "usability tests" which have more than one author and are published after "2000". This query finds a phrase, counts the number of occurrences of an element, runs a greater than comparison on dates, and combines the results.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q7
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q7.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q7.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q8 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q8 Query with XPath Expression Within Full-Text Expression: Find all books published after "2001" which share a subject with the book with the short title "Usability Basics". This query finds words using an XPath expression to identify the words queried and looks for a publication date after the one specified.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q8
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q8.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q8.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q9 Query Using an XQuery Expression to Determine the Number of Words Allowed in a Window: Find all books which discuss "successfully completing tasks". This query finds words within a window, allowing more words within the window depending on the number of chapters in the book.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9
                                                                                                                                                                  Query:
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                  Description:
                                                                                                                                                                  Q9 Query Using an XQuery Expression to Determine the Number of Words Allowed in a Window: Find all books which discuss "successfully completing tasks". This query finds words within a window, allowing more words within the window depending on the number of chapters in the book.
                                                                                                                                                                  Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                  #xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9
                                                                                                                                                                  Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                                  Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9b.xq
                                                                                                                                                                  Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: stemming-dictionary Source ID: english (as auxiliary URI)
                                                                                                                                                                  Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                  Role: principal Comparator: Fragment Results/UseCase/UseCase-XQUERY-XPATH-COMPOSABILITY/xquery-xpath-composability-queries-results-q9.txt

                                                                                                                                                                  3.16Use Case "SCORE"

                                                                                                                                                                  Queries that must be written with score. Section 17.

                                                                                                                                                                    score-queries-results-q1 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                                    Q1 Query Returning Scores: Find all books which mention "usability" in the title or the text. Return book titles and scores. This query performs a word query and returns scores, highest scores first. Score is implementation-dependent, so any answer is acceptable, a few possible answers are provided.
                                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                    #score-queries-results-q1
                                                                                                                                                                    Query:
                                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q1.xq
                                                                                                                                                                    Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q1.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q1-alt.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q1-alt2.txt

                                                                                                                                                                    score-queries-results-q2 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                                    Q2 Query Returning Results with Top Scores: Find the best two books on "usability". This query performs a word query and returns only the results with the two top scores. Score is implementation-dependent, so any answer is acceptable, a few possible answers are provided.
                                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                    #score-queries-results-q2
                                                                                                                                                                    Query:
                                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q2.xq
                                                                                                                                                                    Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q2.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q2-alt.txt

                                                                                                                                                                    score-queries-results-q3 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                                    Q3 Query Filtering on Scores: Find all books that focus on "usability". This query performs a word query and filters on scores.Score is implementation-dependent, so any answer is acceptable, a few possible answers are provided.
                                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                    #score-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                                    Query:
                                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3.xq
                                                                                                                                                                    Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3-alt.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3-alt2.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3-alt3.txt

                                                                                                                                                                    score-queries-results-q3b Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                                    Q3 Query Filtering on Scores: Find all books that focus on "usability". This query performs a word query and filters on scores. Score is implementation-dependent, so any answer is acceptable, a few possible answers are provided.
                                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                    #score-queries-results-q3
                                                                                                                                                                    Query: (XPath 2.0)
                                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3b.xq
                                                                                                                                                                    Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3-alt.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3-alt2.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q3-alt3.txt

                                                                                                                                                                    score-queries-results-q4 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                                    Q4 Query Combining Score and XML Structure with a Conditional Return: Find all books with parts about "usability testing". This query finds books which contain parts about usability testing, returning entire books, but without part elements identified as irrelevant via score. Score is implementation-dependent, so any answer is acceptable, a few possible answers are provided.
                                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                    #score-queries-results-q4
                                                                                                                                                                    Query:
                                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q4.xq
                                                                                                                                                                    Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q4.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q4-alt.txt
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal Comparator: Inspect Results/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q4-alt2.txt

                                                                                                                                                                    score-queries-results-q5 Scenario: standard Creator: Full-Text Task Force
                                                                                                                                                                    Description:
                                                                                                                                                                    Q5 Query Returning All Books Ordered by Score: Return all books, listing books with text on "software" first. This query performs a word query, returns all the documents in the database, and orders them returning those with found word first, those without last. Score is implementation-dependent, so any answer is acceptable, a few possible answers are provided.
                                                                                                                                                                    Spec Citations:
                                                                                                                                                                    #score-queries-results-q5
                                                                                                                                                                    Query:
                                                                                                                                                                    Queries/XQuery/UseCase/UseCase-SCORE/score-queries-results-q5.xq
                                                                                                                                                                    Inputs:
                                                                                                                                                                    Role: principal-data Source ID: ftusecases
                                                                                                                                                                    Outputs:
